summary: This film, with no dialogue at all, follows a psychotic young woman's nightmarish experiences through one skid-row night.
cast: Adrienne Barrett|Bruno VeSota|Ben Roseman|Richard Barron|Ed Hinkle|Lucille Howland|Jebbie VeSota|Faith Parker|Gayne Sullivan|Shorty Rogers|Shelley Berman|Duane Grey|Jonathan Haze|Ed McMahon|Angelo Rossitto|Aaron Spelling
title: Dementia: La hija del terror
